nodes.text: Gerzob was an astronomical object located in the Outer Rim Territories' Gerzob system. It was the homeworld of the creature known as the Yellow-Bellied Green-Proboscis Marsupial.

Gerzob was mentioned in Revelations, a 2005 Wizards of the Coast roleplaying adventure authored by Margaret Heintz that served as the second installment of the Polarization trilogy of the Living Force campaign. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Gerzob system, and therefore the celestial body, in grid square R-18. Although the StarWars.com Online Companion to that book later placed the Gerzob system in the Hunnoverrs sector, the 2012 The Essential Atlas Extra: Outer Rim Sectors feature of the Online Companion established that the sector and grid square R-18 did not, in fact, intersect.
